## kl init

Initialize your kl-config file with some sample values

### Synopsis

kl init

This command initialize a kl-config.

Examples:
  # Initialize the kl-config file
  kl init
	

```
kl init [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --accountId string   account id
  -h, --help               help for init
  -p, --projectId string   project id
```
